channel.title: Rune-Days 735-742 || Pure 735 loading 742 || BETA || Freindly Staff || 24/7 ||
channel.description:
[URL=http://imgur.com/abatT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/abatT.jpg[/img][/URL] This is where the adventure Begins!
Download Link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xrp9zb1qnbsmvhm/Rune-Days%20742.jar Forums: Not Available/Comming soon as web developer is working on them
You might think, "there are so many servers.. why should i even consider joining this" well you should, why? because this server is actually coded, not leeched or anything
My point is, why seek longer when you already found the perfected one?
The server of Rune-Days is 742, Fully. Developed by Century (A.K.A = The owner of the server) it will become one of the best coded servers out there, as it was converted from Matrix's into a Fully working 742.
Our original Base was Matrix 718 the original version, then me and my coders decided to convert it to 742, as we were recieving alot of problem with the server and alot of the Classes and Packet's had to be coded from scratch my Dev team left me, But i managed to code it Myself, ~~ Century's Quote
Now lets get on with the Picture's shall we?
[URL=http://imgur.com/Qtmph][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qtmph.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/Tpa2R][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Tpa2R.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/EmXpU][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EmXpU.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/0iRGl][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0iRGl.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/gLgDp][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gLgDp.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/jKuNR][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jKuNR.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/GCeCK][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GCeCK.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/NuLW0][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NuLW0.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/IGpbt][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IGpbt.jpg[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imgur.com/abatT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/abatT.jpg[/img][/URL]
We Hope to see you Ingame Soon!
Now a little information about the server: The server came out of it's Alpha Stage this week yesterday (01/03/2013) And is now in BETA , The coder and owner which is I am striving to achieve a fully ECO 742 which is Bug and Glitch free, My previous server's used to be 317 which was called Rs-Effigy, Then started to develop Hyperion V.2 which was a 525 and my other 526 which i worked on was AlphaScape which later on was loading the 657 i decided to open my own server up , I started of with a original 718 until my team and i thought of making a fully working 742 by itself, sadly my team left me in the end and i had to work on my own with the 718.
The Owner is Century, :P
[URL=http://imgur.com/abatT][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/abatT.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

honestly I would recommend anything below 735 those caches have alot you can do with them and most of all you will not experience much of any lagg 734 would be probably your best bet.

Its highly compatible with all sources you just need opcodes for client and source
